mapper.select: SELECT f.favorites_no , f.favorites_reg_date , s.shelter_no , s.careNm , s.careAddr , s.careTel , (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname = f.nickname) as nickname FROM favorites f JOIN shelter s ON f.shelter_no = s.shelter_no

SELECT favorites_no ,favorites_reg_date ,shelter_no ,careNm ,careAddr ,careTel ,(SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname='aa') as nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rn ,f.favorites_no , f.favorites_reg_date , s.shelter_no , s.careNm , s.careAddr , s.careTel , (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname = f.nickname) as nickname FROM favorites f JOIN shelter s ON f.shelter_no = s.shelter_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{cri.amount} ) ) WHERE rn > ( ( #{cri.pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} )
